name: MINDNIGHT
description: MINDNIGHT is a free-to-play online multiplayer, a game of deceit, accusations and unpredictability. It challenges the player's ability to lie and detect other players that are lying.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Greater Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 191 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 4 Cores + Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 191 MB available space
